titleStmt.title: A briefe ansvvere to certaine obiections against the treatise of faith, made by Ez. Culvervvell Clearing him form the errors of Arminius, vniustly layd to his charge.
titleStmt.author: Culverwell, Ezekiel, 1553 or 4-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.D[awson] for William Sheffard, and are to be sold at his shop at the entrance in cut of Lumbard streete into Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Defends Culverwell's "A treatise of faith" (STC 6113.5) against a "Briefe confutation" which was printed but apparently does not survive and whose author Culverwell knew but does not identify--STC.
Most copies are bound with STC 6118.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the entrance in cut of Lumbard streete into Popes-head Alley
